PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2004-09082004-08-13,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  RC
ActCanada Post Corporation Act
PrecisApproval that ANNE JOYNT of Ottawa, Ontario, who was designated to act as President and Chief Executive Officer of the Canada Post Corporation by the Board of Directors of the Canada Post Corporation, continue to act in that position for a period exceeding ninety days until a President is appointed.
AttachmentsAttachment
